Class BreadcrumbEvent<S,V>

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.ui.jbreadcrumb.BreadcrumbEvent<S,V>
Type Parameters:
S - the type of state
V - the type of value
public class BreadcrumbEvent<S,V> extends Object
State changes for a Breadcrumb

  • Constructor Details

    • BreadcrumbEvent

      public BreadcrumbEvent()
      Creates a new empty BreadcrumbEvent.

    • BreadcrumbEvent

      public BreadcrumbEvent(Breadcrumb<S,V> breadcrumb, S state, V value, int stateIndex, BreadcrumbEvent.BreadcrumbEventType eventType)
      Creates a new BreadcrumbEvent.
      Parameters:
      breadcrumb - the breadcrumb that fired the event
      state - the current state
      value - the current value
      stateIndex - the index of the current state
      eventType - the type of event

    • BreadcrumbEvent

      public BreadcrumbEvent(Breadcrumb<S,V> breadcrumb, S state, V value, int stateIndex, S oldState, V oldValue, BreadcrumbEvent.BreadcrumbEventType eventType)
      Creates a new BreadcrumbEvent.
      Parameters:
      breadcrumb - the breadcrumb that fired the event
      state - the current state
      value - the current value
      stateIndex - the index of the current state
      oldState - the previous state (for GOTO_STATE events)
      oldValue - the previous value (for GOTO_STATE events)
      eventType - the type of event
